subject:
Re: [cc-community] Do you know about case study on why it is better
 to use CC instead of full Copyright?
body:
I missed the word "full" before copyright.
dessi


Björn Lindström wrote:

Dessi Pefeva <dpefeva@isoc.bg>:

  

Do someone know a review or case study on why it is better to use CC
instead of Copyright for scientific material or presentation on how
to exchange knowledge within a company?
    


You seem to have misunderstood how the Creative Commons licenses
work. The licenses are copyright licenses, and any work under them
thus has to be under copyright.
